issue.title: [R] CI jobs should use the latest version of rcmdcheck
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13992](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13992). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Multiple builds have failed due to an error in rcmdcheck which is fixed here: https://github.com/r-lib/rcmdcheck/issues/139

Builds which have failed
https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=11503&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181

https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/3555797624?check_suite_focus=true

We should use the dev version of rcmdcheck instead of the CRAN version to prevent this from happening again.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13992?focusedCommentId=17442405) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Closing this ticket as the change is now in the released version of rcmdcheck
